languages.text: "Закон Империума карает тех, кто это заслужил. Это был последний обвиняемый на сегодня?"
"The law of the Imperium punishes those who deserve it. Was that the last of the accused for the day?"
languages.original_text: "Закон Империума карает тех, кто это заслужил. Это был последний обвиняемый на сегодня?"

traits.locale_text: "The Law of the Imperium punishes those who deserve it. Was it the last of the accused for the day?"

languages.text: “帝国律法必将惩罚那些罪有应得的人。这个人就是今天最后一位受刑者了吗？”
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium punishes those who deserve it. Was that the last of the accused for the day?"

traits.locale_text: “帝国律法必将惩罚那些罪有应得的人。这个人就是今天最后一位受刑者了吗？”

languages.text: «Las leyes del Imperium castigan a quienes lo merecen. ¿Era ese el último acusado de hoy?».
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium punishes those who deserve it. Was that the last of the accused for the day?"

traits.locale_text: «Las leyes del Imperium castigan a quienes lo merecen. ¿Era ese el último acusado de hoy?».

languages.text: "İmparatorluk yasası, hak edenleri cezalandırır. Bugünün son suçlusu bu muydu?"
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium punishes those who deserve it. Was that the last of the accused for the day?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk yasası, hak edenleri cezalandırır. Bugünün son suçlusu bu muydu?"

languages.text: 「帝国の法は、罰を受けるにふさわしい者を罰する。これで今日の犯罪者の処刑は終わったのか？」
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium punishes those who deserve it. Was that the last of the accused for the day?"

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の法は、罰を受けるにふさわしい者を罰する。これで今日の犯罪者の処刑は終わったのか？」

languages.text: « La loi de l'Imperium punit ceux qui le méritent. Était-ce le dernier des accusés du jour ? »
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium punishes those who deserve it. Was that the last of the accused for the day?"

traits.locale_text: « La loi de l'Imperium punit ceux qui le méritent. Était-ce le dernier des accusés du jour ? »

languages.text: "Das Gesetz des Imperiums bestraft jeden, der es verdient. War das der letzte Beschuldigte für heute?"
languages.original_text: "The law of the Imperium punishes those who deserve it. Was that the last of the accused for the day?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Gesetz des Imperiums bestraft jeden, der es verdient. War das der letzte Beschuldigte für heute?"
